data.title: Company List for Careers and Internships - School of Aeronautics and Astronautics - Purdue University
data.meta_description: The Aeronautics and Astronautics curriculum emphasizes the disciplines of aerodynamics, aerospace systems, astrodynamics and space applications, propulsion, structures and materials, dynamics and control, and further provides courses that integrate these disciplines into the design of flight vehicles to perform the required mission.
data.meta_site_name: School of Aeronautics and Astronautics - Purdue University
data.text:
Company List for Careers and Internships

Below is a list of companies in the aeronautical/astronautical and related fields. We encourage our students to use this list to aid in their internship and full-time career searches. This is not an exhaustive list, but can be a great start to your job search!
